title: Spectator Mode Bug - Unable to spectate at all

embed.description: I tried to spectate 4 random games (one featured ARAM, two of my friends, a featured Normal) and all of them ended the same way. It's been like this since patch 5.22, 5.23 maybe. I'm not really sure. I play on EUW.

body:
Hi. I've been afflicted by this bug for quite a while now, i always hoped it was something with my current client and that upcoming patches would've solved that but it didn't happen. Basically, when I try to spectate a game it loads, waits a couple seconds and kicks me telling me i disconnected. This happens both if I click something or if Istay absolutely still, not even moving the mouse, it doesn't matter. BaronReplays loads replays just fine. I'm on EUW, my IGN is Ranzhh; I'd like you to help me if you can spare some time! 

Thanks,
Matteo
